comments:
I was disconnecting a project and got this exception in the log. (b.t.w I
selected to delete meta-info from disk). Looks like a race condition between
decorators and the disconnect. The project can't be shared afterwards. It's in a
half-shared state that is invalid.

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSException: Project DECO1_OTHER does not
contain CVS folder meta-information
at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.setProject(CVSTeamProvider.java:197)
at
org.eclipse.team.core.RepositoryProvider.mapNewProvider(RepositoryProvider.java:174)
at org.eclipse.team.core.RepositoryProvider.getProvider(RepositoryProvider.java:415)
at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSLightweightDecorator.getCVSProviderFor(CVSLightweightDecorator.java:126)
at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSLightweightDecorator.decorate(CVSLightweightDecorator.java:163)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.LightweightDecoratorDefinition.decorate(LightweightDecoratorDefinition.java:158)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.LightweightDecoratorManager$LightweightRunnable.run(LightweightDecoratorManager.java:59)
at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1034)
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:432)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.LightweightDecoratorManager.decorate(LightweightDecoratorManager.java:212)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.LightweightDecoratorManager.getDecorations(LightweightDecoratorManager.java:195)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.decorators.DecorationScheduler$1.run(DecorationScheduler.java:257)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:61)

The problem is that the operation does an unmanage first and and an unmap 
after that. In between the two, the project is in an invalid state. The unmap 
needs to be done before the CVS folders are purged.

Actually, although my last point is a problem as well I don't think it's the 
only issue. I suspect we need a lock in RepositoryProvider to ensure that 
trying to obtain a provider instance doesn't recreate one in the middle of an 
unmap.
